meaning: "to eat"

entries.meaning: of men, animals "eat, feed (on)"; of baby *tulâša a.* "feed (from) her breast"; "bite" o.'s lips
transf. of fire, god causing disease, pest, enemy "consume, devastate"; of pain, grief "consume; irritate, hurt" part of body
"soak up" liquid, "absorb" fat
"use up, spend" money
"have usufruct of, enjoy" field, agricultural product, share, booty
in idioms *cf.* *asakku* II, *ikkibu*, *karṣu*; OB math. of wall etc. "decrease in width"

amplifiedMeanings.meaning: of lands "ravage each other"; of stars "cover, absorb each other"
caus. of G \[GU7\] "make" men, animals, fire "eat, feed on, consume" food, medication, goods, booty, lands; "steep" an object in liquid; OA "satisfy" a claimant; jB stat. "is infected" with a disease
\[GU7\] OB math. "multiply together", freq. "square" measured lengths N pass. of G \[GU7\]

source: **akālu(m)** "to eat" **G** (*a/u*) \[GU7\] **1.** of men, animals "eat, feed (on)"; of baby *tulâša a.* "feed (from) her breast"; "bite" o.'s lips **2.** transf. of fire, god causing disease, pest, enemy "consume, devastate"; of pain, grief "consume; irritate, hurt" part of body **3.** "soak up" liquid, "absorb" fat **4.** "use up, spend" money **5.** "have usufruct of, enjoy" field, agricultural product, share, booty **6.** in idioms *cf.* *asakku* II, *ikkibu*, *karṣu*; OB math. of wall etc. "decrease in width" **Gtn** iter. of G \[GU7.GU7\] **Gt** of lands "ravage each other"; of stars "cover, absorb each other" **Š** caus. of G \[GU7\] "make" men, animals, fire "eat, feed on, consume" food, medication, goods, booty, lands; "steep" an object in liquid; OA "satisfy" a claimant; jB stat. "is infected" with a disease **Št** \[GU7\] OB math. "multiply together", freq. "square" measured lengths N pass. of G \[GU7\]; \> *akalu*; *aklu*; *ākilu*, *ākiltum*, *akkilu*; *akiltu*; *iklu* II, *ikiltu*; *akussu*, *ukultu*, *uklu* II; *ukullû* I; *mākalum*, *mākaltu*, *mākālu*; *tākaltu*?; *tākultu*; *šūkulu*, *šūkultu*; *mušākilu*, *mušākilūtum*; *cf.* *musakkiltu*

meaning: (*aš-š...* etc.) "to, for" (freq. abbr. *an*, with assimilation of *n* to following consonant (OA often wr. *a*)) (prep., governs subst. in gen., pers. pron. in dat.) \[from MB onwards DIŠ; O/MB occas. NAM; M/jB ŠÈ\]

entries.meaning: of space etc.: move, go, come "to, towards", bring, send, give, speak, write "to", also *ana ṣēr(i)*, *ana muhhi*; sit down "near, beside"; lay, put, throw down "onto"; substitute, compensate "for"; weigh "for"; sacrifice "to"; wait "for"; look "at"; submit "to"; set "against"; grow angry "at"
of time: "for", *ad-dār* "forever"; "within"
of purpose, intention: "for" marriage, work, journey; give "for" o.'s life; before infin. "(in order) to"
"for, in favour of" s.o.
"towards, against"
"in view of, in the light of" s.th., *ana šuāti* "thereupon"
"by order of, on behalf of"
buy, sell, exchange s.th. "(in return) for"
distrib.: "by", *šatta ana šatti* "year by year", *idi ana idi* "on all sides"
"per, for each" NA, NB *ana ūmu* "per diem"
causal and sim.: "about, concerning" house, field; weep, rejoice "over" s.th.
NB comm., of noun "(derived) from, belonging to" vb.
NB *ana lā cf.* *alla*, NB *analānuššu* "without him"
NA, NB as nota accusativi (*cf.* GAG §114e)

modal: *ana pī* "according to"; OA, OB *ana gamrim*, jB, NA *ana gimirtīšu* "completely"; cf. *sihirtu* 3, *qātu* 11, *zīmu*; OA *ana šalšīšu* "three times" (Bab. *cf.* *adi* 1); NA *ana ešrāte* "ten times", "by" one-third, a quarter etc.
pleonastic before term.-adv.: e.g. *ana ma'diš* "to a great degree"
before prep., adv. cf. *mahru* II, *pānu* I 8 etc.
"as for, with respect to", OA, OB *ana ša* "with respect to the fact that, with respect to that which"; NB *cf.* *ašša*

source: **ana** I, *an* (*aš-š...* etc.) "to, for" (freq. abbr. *an*, with assimilation of *n* to following consonant (OA often wr. *a*)) (prep., governs subst. in gen., pers. pron. in dat.) \[from MB onwards DIŠ; O/MB occas. NAM; M/jB ŠÈ\] **1.** of space etc.: move, go, come "to, towards", bring, send, give, speak, write "to", also *ana ṣēr(i)*, *ana muhhi*; sit down "near, beside"; lay, put, throw down "onto"; substitute, compensate "for"; weigh "for"; sacrifice "to"; wait "for"; look "at"; submit "to"; set "against"; grow angry "at" **2.** of timē "for", *ad-dār* "forever"; "within" **3.** of purpose, intention: "for" marriage, work, journey; give "for" o.'s life; before infin. "(in order) to" **4.** "for, in favour of" s.o. **5.** "towards, against" **6.** "in view of, in the light of" s.th., *ana šuāti* "thereupon" **7.** "by order of, on behalf of" **8.** buy, sell, exchange s.th. "(in return) for" **9.** distrib.: "by", *šatta ana šatti* "year by year", *idi ana idi* "on all sides" **10.** "per, for each" NA, NB *ana ūmu* "per diem" **11.** causal and sim.: "about, concerning" house, field; weep, rejoice "over" s.th. **12.** NB comm., of noun "(derived) from, belonging to" vb. **13.** NB *ana lā cf.* *alla*, NB *analānuššu* "without him" **14.** NA, NB as nota accusativi (*cf.* GAG §114e) **15.** modal: *ana pī* "according to"; OA, OB *ana gamrim*, jB, NA *ana gimirtīšu* "completely"; *cf.* *sihirtu* 3, *qātu* 11, *zīmu*; OA *ana šalšīšu* "three times" (Bab. *cf.* *adi* 1); NA *ana ešrāte* "ten times", "by" one-third, a quarter etc. **16.** pleonastic before term.-adv.: e.g. *ana ma'diš* "to a great degree" **17.** before prep., adv. cf. *mahru* II, *pānu* I 8 etc. 18. "as for, with respect to", OA, OB *ana ša* "with respect to the fact that, with respect to that which"; NB cf. *ašša*

akkadischeGlossareUndIndices.note: astronomische Metaphorik, zu bibbu, manzāzu, šarūrū maqātu, šarūrī našû, baʾālu, ummulu, adanna etēqu
Beleg, Lit.; G und D, Objekt apītum

supplementsAkkadianDictionaries:
**baʾālu** “to be exceptionally big, bright; to be in force, forceful”  
**G 1.** OB *mādiš ib-il* AbB 13, 15: 11 “he was very forceful(?)”. *ibissû* … *mādiš ib-ta-il* AbB 10, 32: 36 “the loss has become very great”.  
**2.** OB lit. *sunqum ḫušaḫḫu nebrītum u miṭītum ba-li-il*(*-ma*) *ittī nišī labiriš bašī* ZA 110, 40f. i 49 and dupl. “famine, starvation, hunger and want are mixed up with (the fate of the) people and exist for a long time”.  
**D** **1.** OB lit. PN *ina eper* KUR *bu-lu-ul* ZA 110, 48 iii 37 “PN is mixed with the dust of the netherworld”.  
**2.** OB “to make important, exaggerate, enlarge” (s. AHw 1546 for other D- and Dtn-stem forms): *apītam ub-ta-aḫ-i-il* AbB 13, 85: 18 “I have enlarged the fallow land”.

meaning: "to lean on; impose"

entries.meaning: "lean on" (= acc.) person, thing; ext., math., stat. "is in contact with, touches, reaches to"; of boat "land", of stars "come into contact with"; "rely on, take refuge with" deity, "in" corner, hiding place; *šadâ(šu) e.* "resort to mountain" (= disappear)

"impose, put s.th. on (= acc.) s.o./s.th."; "install" door, beam; "load" captives on boat; "put" yoke, load "on" donkey, neck; "impose" corvée, tribute, tax etc.; penalty, judgement, oath(- taking); illness, woe; O/MB *pūt- e.* "give guarantee"

amplifiedMeanings.meaning: iter. MB "push ever further" into woods

"install" beams etc.; med. "apply" dressing; *qāta(m) u.* "lay hands on", liter. and transf. of legal act; "dock" a ship; "build" quay "onto" bank; "set" fire to s.th.; "hide (intrans.) in" corners; stat. "is in contact with"; OA "assemble, load" goods etc.
caus. of G OAkk "cause to take refuge"; NB "cause to impose" tax
"bring" troops etc. "together", "put" (o.'s heads) "together"; "add up" amounts; "knit" o.'s eyebrows; of parts of body, of liver; med. "mix", "add" ingredients "to one another"

entries.meaning: recipr. of persons "get together" with (= *itti*), "confer"; of troops "combine, join up"; "meet" in battle; of parts of liver, stars "converge, meet up"; Nuzi stat. "adjoins"
"betake o.s. to", "seek refuge in"
pass. of G "be propped up"; "be imposed"; "be placed next to"

source: **emēdu(m)** "to lean on; impose" **G** (OA, early OB *a/u*, later *i/i*) \[UŠ\] **1.** "lean on" (= acc.) person, thing; ext., math., stat. "is in contact with, touches, reaches to"; of boat "land", of stars "come into contact with"; "rely on, take refuge with" deity, "in" corner, hiding place; *šadâ(šu) e.* "resort to mountain" (= disappear) **2.** "impose, put s.th. on (= acc.) s.o./s.th."; "install" door, beam; "load" captives on boat; "put" yoke, load "on" donkey, neck; "impose" corvée, tribute, tax etc.; penalty, judgement, oath(- taking); illness, woe; O/MB *pūt- e.* "give guarantee" **Gtn** iter. MB "push ever further" into woods **Gt** OAkk "lie on each other" **D** "install" beams etc.; med. "apply" dressing; *qāta(m) u.* "lay hands on", liter. and transf. of legal act; "dock" a ship; "build" quay "onto" bank; "set" fire to s.th.; "hide (intrans.) in" corners; stat. "is in contact with"; OA "assemble, load" goods etc. **Dt** pass. of D with *qātu* **Š** caus. of G OAkk "cause to take refuge"; NB "cause to impose" tax **Št** "bring" troops etc. "together", "put" (o.'s heads) "together"; "add up" amounts; "knit" o.'s eyebrows; of parts of body, of liver; med. "mix", "add" ingredients "to one another" **N** **1.** recipr. of persons "get together" with (= *itti*), "confer"; of troops "combine, join up"; "meet" in battle; of parts of liver, stars "converge, meet up"; Nuzi stat. "adjoins" **2.** "betake o.s. to", "seek refuge in" **3.** pass. of G "be propped up"; "be imposed"; "be placed next to" **Ntn** (or **Nt** ?) "continually join together", astr. "continually conjoin"; \> *emdu* I; *ēmidu*, *emmēdu*; *imdu*, *imittu* II; *nēmedu*, *nēmettu*; *etmudu*, *etamdu*; *mummidu*?; *šutēmudu*; *muttetendu*; *umdu*?

meaning: "to enter"

entries.meaning: "come in" (vent.), "go in" to (= *ana*) house, to (meet) s.o.; "enter" house (to take up residence; in marriage, adoption, servitude); land, city, heaven, underworld; *e. u (w)aṣû(m)* "go/come in and out"
"enter" new condition, e.g. *ana wardūtim/qāt PN/ilkim/adê e.* "go into slavery/possession of PN/state service/sworn contract"
"report for duty, present o.s." to, before deity, king, lawcourt
of food, drink, incense "enter" the body; of work, lament *ana libbi-/ina karši- e.*, i.e. be painful; of building, feature on liver "encroach, overlap"
of goods, money etc. "come in, arrive"; of water, caravan, month, season; of sun "set"

amplifiedMeanings.meaning: iter. \[KU4.KU4(.MEŠ)\], e.g. Lamaštu *mūterribtum ša bītāti* "who continually enters houses"; of caravans "arrive at different times, successively"; "get into" garment "repeatedly"; gramm. "occur"
(rare) OB "enter" s.th. on (= *ana*) a tablet; Am.; NA stat. (pl. subj.)

caus. of G "introduce" into presence; "post, station" troops in town, land; "take into" temple as offering, house as present; "bring in" harvest, "import" goods; "deliver" letter, tablet etc.; "send in" news; "consign" stele etc. to darkness etc.; "insert", stat. of part of liver "is inserted"

source: **erēbu(m)** I "to enter" **G** (Bab. *u/u*, Ass. *a/u*; OB perf. occas. *īterib*) \[KU4(.RA)\] **1.** "come in" (vent.), "go in" to (= *ana*) house, to (meet) s.o.; "enter" house (to take up residence; in marriage, adoption, servitude); land, city, heaven, underworld; *e. u (w)aṣû(m)* "go/come in and out" **2.** "enter" new condition, e.g. *ana wardūtim/qāt PN/ilkim/adê e.* "go into slavery/possession of PN/state service/sworn contract" **3.** "report for duty, present o.s." to, before deity, king, lawcourt **4.** of food, drink, incense "enter" the body; of work, lament *ana libbi-/ina karši- e.*, i.e. be painful; of building, feature on liver "encroach, overlap" **5.** of goods, money etc. "come in, arrive"; of water, caravan, month, season; of sun "set" **Gtn** iter. \[KU4.KU4(.MEŠ)\], e.g. Lamaštu *mūterribtum ša bītāti* "who continually enters houses"; of caravans "arrive at different times, successively"; "get into" garment "repeatedly"; gramm. "occur" **Gt** O/jB "enter permanently"? **D** (rare) OB "enter" s.th. on (= *ana*) a tablet; Am.; NA stat. (pl. subj.) **Š** caus. of G "introduce" into presence; "post, station" troops in town, land; "take into" temple as offering, house as present; "bring in" harvest, "import" goods; "deliver" letter, tablet etc.; "send in" news; "consign" stele etc. to darkness etc.; "insert", stat. of part of liver "is inserted" **Štn** iter. of Š; \> *erbu* I.II; *ēribu*, *ēribtum*, *ērib bīti* etc.; *errēbu*, *errebtu*, *errēbūtu*; *erubbātum*; *urbu* I, *urubātu* I; *nērebu*, *nērebtu*, *nērebūtum*; *šūrubtu*, *mušēribtum*; *tērubtu*

meaning: pl. *ilū*, *ilānu* "god, deity" \[DINGIR; jB NI; jB occas. DINGIR.NITA; OA also EL; pl. also DINGIR.DINGIR\] "a" or "the god", also du.; personal "god", *i. išû(m)*, *i. rašû(m)* "to be, get lucky"; OA *bēl lā ilim*, jB *lā bēl ili* "luckless person"; ref. to divine statue, of metal, repaired, in ritual, plundered; OB divine symbols; demon, esp. *ilu lemnu*; mythical hero, deified king; *mārat i.* (a priestess) jB;
source: **ilu(m)**, *elu(m)*; pl. *ilū*, *ilānu* "god, deity" \[DINGIR; jB NI; jB occas. DINGIR.NITA; OA also EL; pl. also DINGIR.DINGIR\] "a" or "the god", also du.; personal "god", *i. išû(m)*, *i. rašû(m)* "to be, get lucky"; OA *bēl lā ilim*, jB *lā bēl ili* "luckless person"; ref. to divine statue, of metal, repaired, in ritual, plundered; OB divine symbols; demon, esp. *ilu lemnu*; mythical hero, deified king; *mārat i.* (a priestess) jB; \> *iltu* I, *ilūtu*, *iliš*, *ilānû*; *cf.* *muštarîlu*; *rāšîlūtu*; *šerki-ilūtu*

meaning: (*im-m...*, *ip-p...* etc.) "in, on; by; from" (freq. abbr. *in*, with assimilation of *n* to following consonant (OA often wr. *i*)) \[AŠ; TA; Bogh. ŠÈ\]

entries.meaning: of place "in, on"; of time "on, at", "during", *ina PN* "in the reign of PN"; before infin., *ina amārika* "when you see"
of condition, *ina balāṭim* "in health"
"among", *ina šarrāni* "of, among the kings"
"from, out of", *ina qāt PN* "from the hand of PN"
"by means of, with" tool, weapon etc.; word, incantation; "with, out of" material (brick, stone)
"in consequence of, as a result of", *ina mahāṣim* "because of beating"; *ina qibīt DN* "at DN's command"
"with respect to; according to", "(measured) by" cubit, *sūtu* etc.
*ina lā* (*cf.* *illā*) "in, because of the absence of", *ina lā idê* "unwittingly"
conj. + stat. subjunct. "so long as", *ina balṭu u šalmu* "while alive and well"

source: **ina**, *in* (*im-m...*, *ip-p...* etc.) "in, on; by; from" (freq. abbr. *in*, with assimilation of *n* to following consonant (OA often wr. *i*)) \[AŠ; TA; Bogh. ŠÈ\] **1.** of place "in, on"; of time "on, at", "during", *ina PN* "in the reign of PN"; before infin., *ina amārika* "when you see" **2.** of condition, *ina balāṭim* "in health" **3.** "among", *ina šarrāni* "of, among the kings" **4.** "from, out of", *ina qāt PN* "from the hand of PN" **5.** "by means of, with" tool, weapon etc.; word, incantation; "with, out of" material (brick, stone) **6.** "in consequence of, as a result of", *ina mahāṣim* "because of beating"; *ina qibīt DN* "at DN's command" **7.** "with respect to; according to", "(measured) by" cubit, *sūtu* etc. **8.** *ina lā* (*cf.* *illā*) "in, because of the absence of", *ina lā idê* "unwittingly" **9.** conj. + stat. subjunct. "so long as", *ina balṭu u šalmu* "while alive and well"

supplementsAkkadianDictionaries:
**tarbāṣu** “animal stall; courtyard; an ornament; halo (of the moon)”  
**1.** OB an ornament: \[…\] *ḫurāṣu ša tar-ba-ṣi* ARM 25, 644: 12 “gold for the *t*. ornament”; cf. 118 r. 25; 612: 3. On *t*. as part of GUR₇(.ME) jewellery in Mari (CAD T 220) s. Durand 1990e, 145f.; ARM 32, 94.  
**2.** Mayer 2009, 430: SB *akulī alpa ina tar-ba-ṣi* LKA 153 r. 3 “eat a bull in the animal stall!”  
**3.** MB Ugar. *bītu* : *ta-ar-bá-ṣí u bītu alpī ana šâšuma* PRU 3, 91: 17 “the house, (gloss:) the cattle-pen and the house of the oxen are his”. Cf. Huehnergard 1987, 176; Sivan 1984, 279. The gloss mark seems to denote *ta-ar-bá-ṣí* as a foreign word. Cf. alphabetic *trbṣ* Olmo Lete/ Sanmartín 2004, 877.  
**4.** MB Ekalte *ḫarrānu ša ana tar-ba-ṣi ša āli urrad* WVDOG 102, 11: 5 “the street that leads down to the city square”, s. Mayer ib. p. 10.  
**5.** For NA ref. s. Radner 1997, 261f.  
**6.** NB *alluttu* *ina* ⸢TÙR⸣ *Sîn* \[*izzīz*\] SAA 18, 124: 3 “cancer \[stood\] in the moon’s halo”.  
\[JW (1, 4, 5), MPS (1, 3, 6), NR (2, 3)\]

meaning: "scorpion" \[GÍR.TAB\]; also in *aban z.* (desig. of stone); astr. "Scorpius";
source: **zuqiqīpu(m)**, *zuqa(q)qīpu*, *zuka/iqīpu* "scorpion" \[GÍR.TAB\]; also in *aban z.* (desig. of stone); astr. "Scorpius"; \< *zaqāpu*; \> *zuqiqīpānu*, *zuqaqīpāniš*

meaning: (11th Bab. month) OAkk, Bab., NA \[OB ITI.ZÍZ.A; later ITI.ZÍZ(.A.AN)\]
source: **Šabāṭu** I (11th Bab. month) OAkk, Bab., NA \[OB ITI.ZÍZ.A; later ITI.ZÍZ(.A.AN)\]

meaning: "to put, place, lay down" \[GAR; occas. MAR\]

entries.meaning: "set in place" image, stele; ritual equipment, furniture; "deposit" document; "plant" tree, plant; "put on" jewellery, clothing; Am., Ug. "put" to the flames, burn; M/NB *ana utūni š.* "melt down"
stat. *šakin* "is placed, is located, is present" om. of parts, marks, signs; places, water, boundaries; of people "are settled"

"provide, supply with" (= 2 acc.), stat. "is supplied with" of people with jewellery, weapons, hairdo; field, subsistence; "is provided" with part of body, e.g. demon, monstrous birth with head, tail etc.; "apply" plaster to building; "equip" with life, understanding, "mark" with brand
"place" foot, hand etc.; transf. OB(Susa) "place" hand and tongue = "to pledge"; ear, eye, face = "attend"
"put" person(s) on stake, in lap etc.; "appoint, assign, install" to office; "place" as pledge
math. "put down" a number etc.
"impose" tax; victory
"fix, arrange, contrive" time, festival, boundary; assembly, consultation
"confer, issue" decision, pardon
"pronounce, issue" word(s), statement, oath, OB ellipt. "declare, inform"
"make, conclude, establish" agreement, treaty, friendship
"create, cause, bring about" good, evil, light, dark; peace, plenty; flood, trouble, need; freedom, protection; murder, rebellion; defeat; ominous result; cessation of work
"carry out, organize" actions, activities; OB ellipt. "treat, process" dates; NB *ina ṭābti š.* "preserve, salt"
"make, install, set up, establish" road, nest, dwelling, garden plot, account, name i.e. succession
*ana X š.* "convert to, change into", "use as"

amplifiedMeanings.meaning: "place permanently, enduringly", esp. jB var. of G

entries.meaning: caus. of "to place" etc.
caus. of "is present" (*šakin*) "make to be present"; "cause to settle, camp"; "make reside" fear of god in s.o.; "cause to be provided with"

amplifiedMeanings.meaning: pass. of G "be put"; of goods "be deposited"; *zīm*, *pān X naškunu* "have the appearance of, look like"; MB, Am. "come together with s.o."; "become"

"put" to the flames, burn; M/NB *ana utūni š.* "melt down" **2.** stat. *šakin* "is placed, is located, is present" om. of parts, marks, signs; places, water, boundaries; of people "are settled" **3.** "provide, supply with" (= 2 acc.), stat. "put down" a number etc. **7.** "impose" tax; victory **8.** "fix, arrange, contrive" time, festival, boundary; assembly, consultation **9.** "confer, issue" decision, pardon **10.** "pronounce, issue" word(s), statement, oath, OB ellipt. "treat, process" dates; NB *ina ṭābti š.* "preserve, salt" **14.** "make, install, set up, establish" road, nest, dwelling, garden plot, account, name i.e. succession **15.** *ana X š.* "convert to, change into", "use as" **Gtn** iter. of G (jB imper. *tišakkan*) \[NB GAR.MEŠ ?\] **Gt** "place permanently, enduringly", esp. jB var. of G **D** jB/NA "appoint as *šaknu*"? **Š** **1.** caus. of "to place" etc. **2.** caus. of "is present" (*šakin*) "make to be present"; "cause to settle, camp"; "make reside" fear of god in s.o.; "cause to be provided with" **Štn** iter. of Š 2 **N** pass. of G "be put"; of goods "be deposited"; *zīm*, *pān X naškunu* "have the appearance of, look like"; MB, Am. meaning: "if" (NB only lit.; *cf.* *kī* 4) \[BAD; om., med. DIŠ; UD (also OB 360+40; MAŠ; AŠ); NA also MU (\< *šumu*)\]

entries.meaning: introducing condit. clauses in indic.: "if" (*cf.* GAG §161)
introducing oaths, with subjunct. M/NA, M/jB (OB with indic.): *šumma lā* = pos., *šumma* = neg. oath
*šumma ... šumma* "whether ... or" (*cf.* GAG §§161b-c, 180b); ext. "either ... or"; MB also *(u) šumma* "or rather ..."
OA *š. libbika* "if you wish"; *š. lā* "without, in the absence of"
NA introducing indir. questions, with subjunct. "whether, if" (*cf.* GAG §180b)
Am., Nuzi, Bogh. conj. "when"
Bab., Am., NA adv. "now see, truly";

"either ... or"; MB also *(u) šumma* "or rather ..." **4.** OA *š. libbika* "if you wish"; *š. lā* "without, in the absence of" **5.** NA introducing indir. questions, with subjunct. "whether, if" (*cf.* GAG §180b) **6.** Am., Nuzi, Bogh. conj. "when" **7.** Bab., Am., NA adv. "now see, truly"; \> *šummaman*; *šummu* I

akkadischeGlossareUndIndices.note: Konditionalsatz: p. [IV], abstract: “as opposed to the standard account found in von Soden's Grundriss, it is established that the preterite (iprus) is associated with the statement of conditions in past time”. [S. Hirsch, AOAT 1 (1969), 125; Or 44 (1975), 321f.]
Perfekt: in šumma-Satz “indicates future discovery of a past action”
zwei š.-Sätze, zum Ausdruck entgegengesetzter Ergebnisse der Opferschau

cdaAddenda: **šumma** \[Justification\] **3**. for ext. “either ... or” see Mayer, Or. NS 57 (1988) 163.

meaning: pl. m. & f. "day" \[UD; astr. *cf.* 1\]

entries.meaning: "daytime" as opp. to night \[astr. ME\]; is bright, cloudy etc.; *ū. kurû/arku* "short/long day" of winter/summer; times/parts of day *cf.* e.g. *mašlu*, *mišlu*, *qablu* I 3, *šērtu* II, *šēru* II; *kal(a) ūmi* "all day"

"(whole) day" (= 24 hours); as date \[UD.X.KAM = "Xth day", but also "X days"\]; favourable, unfavourable; MA UD-*um* "per day"; MA, jB *u/arah ūmāte* "a whole month"; OA *adi ū. annîm* "till today", jB *ištu ūmimma* "from today"; NA, NB *ūmu (...) ūmu* "day by day; one day ... the other"; st. abs. O/jB *ūm mašil*, *mašil ūm* "half a day"

special days: for rituals, festivals *cf.* e.g. *akītu*, *isinnu*, *tēliltu*; *ūm(u) ili* "(personal?) god's day"; of death, fate etc. *cf.* *bibbulu* 2, *mūtu*, *šīmtu*, *ištēn ū.* etc. "in one day", i.e. quickly

pl. "days" as period of time, of past, future; of s.o.'s lifetime; of allotted period in law, commerce, *umū/ātu* + *malû* "time is up"; of season, weather, harvest, OB *ūmāt šamaššammī* "sesame time"; *ina lā ūmišu* "at the wrong time"
in temporal expressions: *(ina) ū.* "at the time of"; *adi/ultu ū.* "until/since"; *in(a) ūmišu(ma)* "at his time, then", + pres. "at the stipulated time"

source: **ūmu(m)** I; pl. m. & f. "day" \[UD; astr. *cf.* 1\] **1.** "daytime" as opp. to night \[astr. ME\]; is bright, cloudy etc.; *ū. kurû/arku* "short/long day" of winter/summer; times/parts of day *cf.* e.g. *mašlu*, *mišlu*, *qablu* I 3, *šērtu* II, *šēru* II; *kal(a) ūmi* "all day" **2.** "(whole) day" (= 24 hours); as date \[UD.X.KAM = "Xth day", but also "X days"\]; favourable, unfavourable; MA UD-*um* "per day"; MA, jB *u/arah ūmāte* "a whole month"; OA *adi ū. annîm* "till today", jB *ištu ūmimma* "from today"; NA, NB *ūmu (...) ūmu* "day by day; one day ... the other"; st. abs. O/jB *ūm mašil*, *mašil ūm* "half a day" **3.** special days: for rituals, festivals *cf.* e.g. *akītu*, *isinnu*, *tēliltu*; *ūm(u) ili* "(personal?) god's day"; of death, fate etc. *cf.* *bibbulu* 2, *mūtu*, *šīmtu*, *ištēn ū.* etc. "in one day", i.e. quickly **4.** pl. "days" as period of time, of past, future; of s.o.'s lifetime; of allotted period in law, commerce, *umū/ātu* + *malû* "time is up"; of season, weather, harvest, OB *ūmāt šamaššammī* "sesame time"; *ina lā ūmišu* "at the wrong time" **5.** in temporal expressions: *(ina) ū.* "at the time of"; *adi/ultu ū.* "until/since"; *in(a) ūmišu(ma)* "at his time, then", + pres. "at the stipulated time"; \> *ūm*; *ūma*; *ūmiš* 1; *ūmišam*, *ūmussu*; *ūmšu*; *ūmītu*; *ūmtum*; *ūmakkal*, *ūmakkalûm*; *anūmīšu*; *inūmē*, *inūmīšu*; *šalšūmi*; *cf.* *ū.* II
